turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I want to order pizza from Magpie

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that Magpie restaurant, 21 Bank Row, Greenfield

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We'd like a large prosciutto, chicken, and spinach pizza, a large eggplant parm pizza, and a catalan shrimp pizza on gluten free crust

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, confirming you'd like a large prosciutto, chicken, and spinach pizza, a large eggplant parm pizza, and a catalan shrimp pizza on gluten free crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct so far

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What else would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, it's kind of a party, so we'd better add the broccoli rabe and a couple of antipasto plates

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Confirming you'd like to add one broccoli rabe and two antipasto plates to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add anything else, perhaps dessert?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, yeah! Actually, no, we don't need dessert.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, so that's a large prosciutto, chicken, and spinach pizza, a large eggplant parm pizza, and a catalan shrimp pizza on gluten free crust, one broccoli rabe and two antipasto plates. Did I get everything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup, sounds like it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, your order will be ready in 25 minutes, and will cost $87.50

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK, sounds great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add a 10% tip!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, adding 10% tip

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, that's all!
